content: this crochet cat bucket hat is a fun and functional accessory for kids featuring a classic bucket hat shape with a wide brim and adorable animal ears it s perfect for sunny days at the park the beach or outdoor play designed to fit children aged 6 9 this brimmed crochet hat is worked in continuous rounds using basic stitches the pattern is easy to adjust for other sizes by adding or removing rounds from the crown base all infos are on my website
